channel.title: Community on Steve Hemingway's website
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Steve Hemingway's website

item.title: Knebworth JMI Environmental Area
item.description: The Environmental Area, AKA the Wildlife Haven It was fascinating to see the Knebworth Primary School Environmental Area when I visited the school on Friday, 31st March for the official opening, with Stephen McPartland MP. I have never really ventured very far beyond the dining room in the school (where Knebworth Village Trust meetings are held). Now, thanks to many weeks of hard work put in by Alena Evans of Evans on Earth the EA is finished.

item.title: A Vision for Knebworth
item.description: Links I think the following links and email addresses should be better known: a dedicated Neighbourhood Plan website, which currently has mainly minutes of the meetings of the steering group. Save the Station Pub Campaign team email. The Neighbourhood Plan Survey The discussion list for the NP The Neighbourhood Plan Survey Save the Station Pub Facebook Group, Save the Station Pub Twitter Save the pub mailing list signup Save the pub survey
